message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you get a solid 40%.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, considering the inflation
The inflation hurts us both, Bob. Let's settle this quickly. I'll take a bit less than my initial offer, you get a bit more than your previous one.
Considering the inflation impact, I think this is a fair adjustment, slightly in my favor.
Bob, it's clear we both want this money. Let's stop wasting time with the inflation eating away at our potential gains. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest solution.
